title: 2026 Winter Registration Now Open!
content: Registration for the Winter 2026 season is now open. Sign up here -> https://www.swarthmorerecreation.org/adult-soccer/

title: MSI Wednesday Night Soccer League
content: MSI registration is closed for the Winter 2026 season.

title: Pottsball 2026
content: We are eagerly awaiting the registration of Rose Tree Media's Pottsball season in the spring. Keep an eye on Rose Tree's website. https://www.rosetreesoccer.org/Default.aspx?tabid=193636
